suncertify.utils
Class Localization

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.utils.Localization

public final class Localization
extends java.lang.Object

Simple utility class to localize strings. This is a thread safe singleton class.

getLocale

public static java.util.Locale getLocale()
Get the locale that we are using.

Returns:
the current locale

getChar

public static char getChar(java.lang.String key)
Get a translated character. The character returned is the first character in the translated string.

Parameters:
key - the character's translation key
Returns:
the translated string

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
Get a translated version of a string.

Parameters:
key - the string to translate
Returns:
the translated string

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                         int... args)
Get a translated version of a string that has a list of int arguments.

Parameters:
key - the string to translate
args - the int arguments to use
Returns:
the translated string

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                         java.lang.String... args)
Get a translated version of a string that has a list of String arguments.

Parameters:
key - the string to translate
args - the String arguments to use. Note that these parameters do not get translated.
Returns:
the translated string

getStringIfPresent

public static java.lang.String getStringIfPresent(java.lang.String key)
Get a translated version of a string if it has a translation. If there is not translation, return the original string.

Parameters:
key - the string to translate
Returns:
the translated string, or the key if there is not translation.

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String message,
                                         java.lang.Object[] values)
Get a translated version of a string by combining a translated string with a parameter list. Note that the values in the array are not translated.

Parameters:
message - the message (gets translated)
values - raw parameters to message. Note that these parameters do not get translated.
Returns:
formatted, translated string
